title: EZCRA Beginner Needlepoint Cross Stitch Kit for Kids Ages 5-8 – Easy Embroidery Starter Set with Jumbo Plastic Needles, Pre-Printed Patterns, Instructions – DIY Arts & Crafts Gift for Girls & Boys
breadCrumbs: Toys & Games > Arts & Crafts > Craft Kits > Sewing
features: 💛Perfect for Kids💛Unleash your child's creativity with our Mess Free Animal Cross Sitch Kit. Our cross stitch kit requires easy yet gentle hand movements, hence boosting your child's motor skills and basic cross stitch skills.
✅ Safe for your Kid✅ All material used are non-toxic and free from harmful chemicals. All our products are tested and comply with the higest level of safety standards.

🌟No Mess, Easy-to-Follow Instructions🌟This cross stitch kit provides a mess-free crafting experience, including Step-by-step instructions, pre-punched holes, pre-cut shapes, jumbo plastic needles and safety scissors that prioritize children's safety without sacrificing their joy.
🌸10 Easy Projects, with all tools needed🌸 This kit includes: 10 Beginner-Friendly Animal Projects such as Unicorn and Bunny, 10 sets of Decorative Stickers, Soft Jumbo Needle and Safety Scissors.

🥳Extra Large Cross Stitch and Jumbo Needle🥳Super easy craft with large pre-punched holes and stitches, perfect for beginners. This cross stitch kit creates a stress-free way for your kid to learn cross stitch for the first time, while unleashing their creativity to decor their projects with our colorful stickers, which sparks endless combination and hours of creative play.

👻For Kids Age 4-8👻Suitable for kids that are 4-8 years old, this cross stitch kit provides an engaging way for children to explore their creativity while honing their motor and hand-eye coordination skills.

🥰 30-Day Guarantee🥰 Shop confidently with our 30 days hassle-free returns, in case your are not satified with our product in any way. If you come across any questions or queries about the product, material or anything else, feel free to reach out to our 24/7 support team.

items.title: Started by Parents, for You
items.text: EZCRA was born from a simple frustration: why were craft kits either too messy or complicated? We created what we wished existed all along—craft kits that respect both children's capabilities and parents' sanity. Today, over 20,000 families have chosen EZCRA to nurture creativity in their homes. Every kit we design starts with this question: 'Would I give this to my own child?' If the answer isn't an enthusiastic yes, it doesn't leave our studio.

items.title: EZCRA, We Make It Easy
items.text: We believe every child deserves to feel the pride of creating something with their own hands—without the mess and frustration.

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Great kit for kids, but instructions could be better
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I got this for my preschooler who loves watching me learn to do embroidery and wanted to make something himself. With a little assistance in threading the needle and making sure he follows the pattern, he has been able to do them himself. The animals are organized from the most basic pattern to the most difficult, which is very helpful. The first two patterns have a very clear guide on how to do the stitches, which are just straight lines of X’s. The annoying part is that when you progress to the more difficult patterns of making shapes and turning corners, there is almost no direction. They show you the picture of which color goes where, but offer no guidance on how best to make that shape. Also worth noting, they tell you how long to cut the yarn for the first two patterns, but there’s no length guidelines on the subsequent patterns, so make sure to count the additional stitches and adjust length accordingly. Yarn quality is great, and my son very much enjoys making them and showing his family what he has made. If you have a background in cross stitch, you’ll likely not be as frustrated as I was. An update in instruction quality or accompanying YouTube tutorials would make this an easy 5 stars.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2026

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Felt cross stitch kit for children
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Perfect gift for my 8 year old niece that watches me cross stitch and wanted to learn.  The wholes were bigger than typical fabric which made teaching her easier.  The plastic needle is still a little sharp, so I would not use with younger children unless supervised.  There were lots of felt animals for her to practice on.  I wish they would come out with more themes for holidays, etc.

Cross Stitch Kits Beginner for Kids: Easy needle point kits for kids and beginners, cute and easy pattern of crafts kit is printed on the Aida cloth. After completion, the pattern can be easily washed off. It is a popular choice for children and beginners to do cross stitch project

We are a young team from China. Our slogan is "Play more easily, enjoy more fun!" 
We offer simple, kid-friendly embroidery kits, aiming to bring the joy of stitching to children and beginners. 
We have our factory to ensure the quality and speed of production. 
We are good at working out novel items and combinations to provide convenience and fun. We never stop creating.

However, the ease of use receives mixed feedback - while some find it easy for beginners, others note there aren't real directions for beginners. Moreover, the kit supplies and value for money get mixed reviews, with several customers reporting missing needles and describing the kit as cheap. Additionally, the size is criticized as too small, and customers find the needles extremely difficult to thread.

title: Caydo 5 PCS Cross Stitch Kits for Kids with Cats and Dogs Patterns Stamped Cross Stitch Kits for Beginners DIY Key Chain, Backpack Charms, Craft Ornaments
breadCrumbs: Arts, Crafts & Sewing > Needlework > Embroidery > Kits
features: Kids Cross Stitch Kits: 5 x embroidery fabric(11CT, 5.12”x 5.12”), 5 x plastic embroidery hoop(2.8 inches), 5 x circular sponge sheet, 15 x embroidery thread, 8 x adhesive-backed paper, 1 x instruction, 5 x keychain, 4 x needle, and 1 x needle threader

Cute Pre-Printed Patterns: Vivid pre-printed patterns with a theme of cats and dogs, attract children's interest. There are color charts to help identify, suitable for kids and beginners to quickly and accurately get started and locate. An interesting cross stitch kits for kids can improve their hand-eye coordination skills, enhance observation and patience

Vivid and Exquisite Keychains: Adhesive-backed paper can be cut and pasted into any shape to decorate. The circular sponge sheet serves as a backing plate to fill and support the back of the embroidery hoops, increasing the elasticity, and making the finished product thicker, making it look fuller and more three-dimensional

Soft and Safe: Embroidery thread is soft and comfortable, with vivid colors that will not entangle or split, which is safe and reliable, and the needle is designed with a round head, which can keep children from stabbing themselves during the embroidery process

Delicate Children's Embroidery present: All of these are packaged in colored boxes, which can be for your kids, or family on birthdays, parties, and Christmas. Stamped cross stitch kit is suitable for completing with children in classrooms and family gatherings, making keychains, backpack accessories, and pendants for decorating windows, trees, and walls

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I’ve been cross stitching for 30 years, and when my son expressed an interest in learning i thought a printed pattern kit would be useful. This kit is a GREAT value. Seriously. I’ve bought stuff from Caydo before and was happy with the products, but my expectations weren’t very high for the price point of this kit. It’s fun and perfect for beginners and advanced stitchers alike! Soooo much better and cheaper than those cheap Bucilla or Dimension kits.They’d also make a great gift-going to grab another to have on hand. All in all I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend this item.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2024

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Great way to introduce cross stitching to your kids.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Tl;dr great kits, check them carefully to make sure all the parts are included and are undamaged.I teach a beginner cross stitch class to 8 year olds and these kits are great. The kids loved the cute designs. I separated the embroidery thread needed for each design ahead of time, which takes forever but it allowed the students to just sew. The preprinted designs make it so easy for them to see which colors go where.However, the first kit that was sent to me was missing a screw for the hoop (it doesn’t work without it). The replacement set had one of the fabrics sliced across the design. The third one was intact.And although there are enough designs for 5 kids to sew, every single kit only came with 4 needles. Luckily I had an extra.  This is only a problem if you’re using it for 5 kids like I did.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2024

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Good for beginners.  Color coded so no counting stitches.

title: KRAFUN Cross Stitch Kits for Kids Beginners, 4 Cross Stitching Keyrings Arts & Crafts with Butterfly and Flower, Needlepoint Embroidery Kit for Girls 5-13 Craft Kit Backpack Charms, Ornaments
breadCrumbs: Arts, Crafts & Sewing > Needlework > Embroidery > Kits
description: 🦋 Make 4 Easy Keyrings 🦋 : Make a total of 4 beginner cross stitch keyrings Art & Craft kit of Butterfly and Flower. Tools and Instructions also included for embroidery cross-stitch craft. All felt pieces have prepunched holes for easy crafting,
features: 🎁 Perfect As A Gift 🎁: Celebrate cross stitch embroidery kits joy and fun with your friends and family. Great way to introduce beginners to learn Art & Craft skills! Great way to introduce beginners to learn fine motor skills and eye hand coordination.

🦋 Make 4 Easy Keyrings 🦋 : Make a total of 4 beginner cross stitch keyrings Art & Craft kit of Butterfly and Flower. Tools and Instructions also included for embroidery cross-stitch craft. All felt pieces have prepunched holes for easy crafting,

🌼 Great For 5+ Years Old Kids 🌼: Great gift for 5+ years old kids who is starting to learn cross stitching technique the first time! Families and friends can also share the fun and complete the kids arts crafts together. Learning cross-stitching, needlepoint, embroidery, crafting skills and create your cute and fun arts and crafts for girls

💮 Safe Tools & Materials 💮 Plastic needle tools are provided, ensure the safety of children during usage. All materials are all from reliable and secure source. All our products are tested thoroughly for safety standards, making sure your kids can enjoy kids cross stitch keyring kits without any worries.

✂️ Easy No Mess Crafting ✂️: No glue required and no more mess! All fabric come with pre-punched holes and pre-cut shapes, simply follow directly with plastic needle tools or hands. Also comes with clear graphical instructions for the cute cross stitch keyring kit ornament, decoration.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find this cross stitch kit great for beginners, with one mentioning it's perfect for craft-loving daughters. Moreover, the kit is easy to use and keeps children busy while being super cute, with one customer noting it helps develop motor skills. However, the instructions receive mixed feedback, with some finding them good while others wish they were clearer. Additionally, customers disagree on the stitch speed.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I bought the Cross Stitch Kits for Kids hoping to keep my kids busy for at least the length of a cup of coffee, and honestly, this kit deserves a medal. The colors are so bright and cheerful they made me want to stitch something, and my kids actually sat down quietly to craft. QUIETLY.They loved making the little butterfly and flower keyrings, and now everything in the house has a new “decorative charm” attached—backpacks, door handles, their beds. It’s a fun, easy craft that makes them feel super accomplished, and I love that it keeps them busy doing something creative instead of asking for snacks every five minutes or endless screen time. This is a great value I purchased two other sets.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Perfect for my craft loving daughter
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: We were very impressed with this kit! Perfect for beginners, and so many fun projects. The larger needles, the prepared fabrics with holes already in them, and the needle threader are exactly what a young person trying out cross stitch for the first time needs. Such a well thought out product. My daughter is loving all the beautiful things she is creating. Highly recommend this kit to anyone considering it. That may sound cheesy, but it’s true! We will be trying more of their kits soon.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Was a little difficult for my 6 year old.  Good value for the money, decent quality of yarn.  But it keeps her busy!

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Great way to teach cross stitch to kids!
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: We are so happy with this product! I love to cross-stitch and my 9-year-old daughter wants to learn. There are 7 projects that are scaffolded in a way to teach the skills sequentially. The patterns are clear with pre-punched holes for the thread to go through. My daughter keeps asking when we can do the next project. Highly recommend!
